data.title: Hookah bar & nightclub!
data.text: I enjoyed this place as you'd never find a place that would let you smoke hookah and serve liquor in Washington State. The prices for drinks were pretty reasonable and the music selection from the DJ was definitely meant for an older crowd as he mixed some old school in. I loved it as I'm a bit older and love the 90's jams. So why only 4 stars? They don't have a dance floor so it was a bit weird with people just dancing anywhere by their tables. It also took away from the energy of having people packed into 1 area to really dance. If they add a floor somewhere and maybe some lights, I might change it to 5 stars.
